TopicTitle: To all those kerbals that went K.I.A

Articles.Content: :\') ... Great story of the Kerman\'s perseverance...

> 
> 1:45: Holy Mother!

Thats what i thought.
Dang well done - Brings home the real meaning of those three little letters: K.I.A.

> 
> Just a question;
> 
> What\'s the name of that music?
> 
> I\'ve always wanted to know.

umm. :-[

i didnt make this so,

I think that\'s the main theme of Apollo 13 (the movie).

Now I feel sad for all those little kerbals that died. It was for science after all. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Thats what i thought.

Can anyone dupe that rocket at 1:45?? I\'m seeing 9 or 10 LFTs on the 2nd stage, but I can\'t see what engines are on it, nor the other stages. I \*really\* want to build that monstrosity, just for S&Gs. May have to contact the author, if he still has it lying around in a junk yard berth behind the VAB.
